Desserts.title: Carrot Halwa
Desserts.description: Grated carrots cooked in milk and butter, garnished with raisins.

Desserts.title: Lychee Malai
Desserts.description: Luscious dessert made from Lychee fruit & malai

Desserts.title: Double Ka Meetha
Desserts.description: Indian bread pudding made with fried bread slices and socaked in creamy rich milk mixture and topped with nuts.

Desserts.title: Gulab Jamoon
Desserts.description: Fried dumplings that are traditionally made of thickened milk and soaked in flavored sugar syrup.

Desserts.title: Qurbani Ka Meetha
Desserts.description: Qurbani Ka Meetha is a loved and most savoured, Hyderabadi Dessert made from dried apricots & sugar.

Desserts.title: Rasmalai
Desserts.description: Milk-based dessert made with cheese dumplings soaked in sweetened & thickened milk.

Desserts.title: Rabdi
Desserts.description: Rich creamy thickened milk, garnished with pistachios.
